author: .fjl
content: Hi guys, this is just to let you know we have *finally* updated the eth & snap protocol tests for the merge.

author: .fjl
content: In fact, <@543900561460822016> has extended the eth tests to cover some Cancun-related scenarios as well.

author: .fjl
content: However, we are having trouble getting clients to accept the test chain.

author: .fjl
content: At the moment, only Geth and Nethermind seem to be able to load the chain correctly

author: .fjl
content: Please check https://hivetests.ethdevops.io/#suite=eth with the latest run to find the issue

author: .fjl
content: BTW, the snap protocol tests use the same chain as eth, and have much better error reporting now. So if we can make the chain load with e.g. besu, it will be a step on the way toward passing snap tests too.
